column4: how can I install a package from a different(unstable) distribute of ubuntu? I need that later version
-- did you try downloading and installing the package?
hmm not yet.. thats a good idea.. but should I download dependencies too then?

-- use the package installer and it should fetch the dependencies that it can.  If it can't -- then maybe set a temporary line in your sources.list file.  Risky -- but if you *need* the file you may be willing to risk it.
